DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that the physiological effects of milk on satiety and glycemic control are mediated by the interaction between its macronutrient components by both insulin-dependent and independent mechanisms.
DOC.brief_title: Mechanism of Action of Milk and Its Components on Glycemic Control in Healthy Young Men
DOC.criteria: Healthy young men 2030 years of age BMI: 2024.9 kg/m2 Smoking Dieting Skipping breakfast Lactose intolerance or allergies to milk Taking medications that may affect glucose metabolism or appetite Diabetes (fasting blood glucose â‰¥ 7.0 mmol/L) or other metabolic diseases
